text: Aap say pehlay basti walon mein hum ney jitney rasool bhejay hain sab mard hi thay jinki taraf hum wahee nazil farmatay gaye. Kiya zamin mein chal phir ker enhon ney dekha nahi kay inn say pehlay kay logon ka kaisa kuch anjam hua? Yaqeenan aakhirat ka ghar perhezgaron kay liye boht hi behtar hai kiya phir bhi tum nahi samajhtay
